POPUP.HEADER_1: Sign in for your best experience
POPUP.HEADER_2: Sign in for your best experience
POPUP.HEADER_BACK_1: Sign in for your best experience
POPUP.TEXT_2:
'Continue with' your trusted login method.
We'll get you going in no time.
POPUP.TEXT_3: You will be redirected to authenticate with your chosen account. We don’t see your password, only confirmation that you authenticated successfully and securely.
POPUP.TEXT_3_2: You will be redirected to authenticate with your chosen account. We don’t see your password, only confirmation that you authenticated successfully and securely. You may be asked to share your profile information, which will be stored securely. You can change your authentication method at any time.

REGISTER.TITLE: Welcome
REGISTER.CONTENT: How would you like to sign up?
REGISTER.SSO: Or create an account with your email address and a password
REGISTER.LOCAL: Create an account with your email address and a password
REGISTER.OR_LOCAL: Or fill in the form below
REGISTER.FILL_FORM: Fill in the form to Sign up

CONFIRM_EMAIL.TITLE: Email confirmation
CONFIRM_EMAIL.CONTENT: A confirmation message has been sent to your email address. Please enter the PIN from that email below

DE_IDENTIFICATION.CONTENT: We believe in your right to control the data gathered on our website. Therefore, to de-identify the record of your interactions with our website, please enter your email address below. Next, we will send you a PIN to verify your account. Once you have entered that PIN, our system will start the process of anonymizing your interactions.
DE_IDENTIFICATION.CONTENT_VERIFIED: We believe in your right to control the data gathered on our website. Therefore, to de-identify the record of your interactions with our website, please authenticate below. Once you have authenticated, our system will start the process of anonymizing your interactions.
DE_IDENTIFICATION.CONTENT_PIN: A confirmation message has been sent to your email address. Please enter the PIN from that email below
DE_IDENTIFICATION.CONFIRM_PIN: Once your PIN is confirmed we will start the de-identification process.
DE_IDENTIFICATION.GET_NEW_PIN: Didn't received your confirmation PIN? Please check your spam folder or %BUTTON% for a new code

FORGOT_PASSWORD.TITLE: Forgot password
FORGOT_PASSWORD.CONTENT: Enter the email you registered with us & we'll send you instructions on how to reset your password
FORGOT_PASSWORD.CONTENT_2: A password reset message was sent to your email address. Please click on the link in the email to reset your password. If you do not receive a password reset message, please check your spam folder.

EXPIRE_PASSWORD.TITLE: Change Password
EXPIRE_PASSWORD.CONTENT: It looks like your password needs to be reset. Enter the email you registered with us & we'll send you instructions on how to reset your password

NEW_CODE.CONTENT:
Didn't receive your confirmation PIN?
Please check your spam folder
or %BUTTON% for a new code

BUTTON.SELECT_IDP_SIGN_UP: Select an Identity Provider to sign up with
BUTTON.SWITCH_LOGIN: Not you? Sign in with a different email address
BUTTON.SWITCH_REGISTER: Not you? Sign up with a different email address.
BUTTON.SWITCH_TRY: Not you? Try with a different email address.
BUTTON.OR_CONTINUE_WITH_EMAIL: or continue with your email address
BUTTON.OR_SIGN_UP_WITH_EMAIL_AND_PASSWORD: Or sign up with your email address and password
BUTTON.OR_SIGN_UP_WITH_EMAIL: Or sign up with your email address
BUTTON.CONTINUE_WITH_EMAIL: or enter your email address below
BUTTON.START_WITH_EMAIL_ADDRESS: Start with your email address below

HOVER.EMAIL_MATCH: Please ensure that the email address you use when signing in is one that has been invited to register.
HOVER.NEW_USER:
To access this website you must first be invited to join.

If you have received an invitation to join please click the link in that email to complete your registration.

If you have lost that email message please contact the person that originally invited you.
HOVER.MORE_INFO: We respect your privacy. You will be directed to authenticate with the provider you trust.

PASSWORD_HINT.LOWER_ONE: contain at least one lower case (a-z)
PASSWORD_HINT.UPPER_ONE: contain at least one upper case (A-Z)
PASSWORD_HINT.NO_EMAIL: does not contain your name or email address
PASSWORD_HINT.MATCH: be entered the same way in both fields
PASSWORD_HINT.NO_OLD_PASSWORD: Your new password must be different than your previous password

EMPTY_TOKEN.MESSAGE: You need to enter a PIN

EMPTY_FIRST_NAME.MESSAGE: Please make sure you have a first name

EMPTY_LAST_NAME.MESSAGE: Please make sure you have a last name

VALID_EMAIL.TITLE: Email format
VALID_EMAIL.MESSAGE: Please make sure you're using a valid email address

PASSWORD_LENGTH.TITLE: Password too short
PASSWORD_LENGTH.MESSAGE: Please enter a password longer than %COUNT% characters

ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Account not found
ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND.MESSAGE: We were unable to find your account. If you have been invited, please click on the link in the email you received to complete registration

NON_LOCAL_LOGIN.MESSAGE: You have previously signed in using %PROVIDER%. Please confirm that you want to set an account password instead.

NO_PROVIDER.TITLE: No Providers Enabled
NO_PROVIDER.MESSAGE: This website has not enabled any Identity Providers or local authentication. Please contact the website administrator for more information.

NULL_EMAIL_ERROR.TITLE: Email Address Required
NULL_EMAIL_ERROR.MESSAGE: The Provider that you authenticated with did not provide your email address. Please log in with a different provider.

MAGIC_LINK_REGISTRATION_DISABLED.MESSAGE: New users cannot register with sign in link.

RES_MAPPING.invalid_pin: Please check to see if you have the right PIN
RES_MAPPING.invalid_email_or_password: Please make sure you're using your latest password

PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTENT: By browsing our website, you agree to our use of cookies.

TOC_PRIVACY.CONTENT_ALL: By submitting my information, I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
TOC_PRIVACY.CONTENT_TOC: By submitting my information, I agree to the Terms of Service
TOC_PRIVACY.CONTENT_PRIVACY: By submitting my information, I agree to the Privacy Policy
TOC_PRIVACY.NAMELESS_CONTENT_ALL: By submitting my information, I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
TOC_PRIVACY.NAMELESS_CONTENT_TOC: By submitting my information, I agree to the Terms of Service
TOC_PRIVACY.NAMELESS_CONTENT_PRIVACY: By submitting my information, I agree to the Privacy Policy

UI.SIGN_IN_TITLE: You are currently signed in as
UI.NEWSLETTER_SUBTITLE: Keep up with the latest information and news

MAGIC_LINK.LEAVE_MAGIC_LINK: Sign in with a trusted provider or email & password
MAGIC_LINK.LEAVE_MAGIC_LINK_OPT_IN: Sign in with a trusted provider or using your email
MAGIC_LINK.CONFIRM_MESSAGE: We've sent a link to confirm your account to the email address above. Click the link to finish signing in.
MAGIC_LINK.FOCUS_MASK_TEXT: Start with your email address above

CONTENT_GATING.TITLE: Welcome
CONTENT_GATING.SUBTITLE: Sign in or create your free account to continue reading.

CUSTOM_DATA.SUB_HEADER: We just have a few questions we'd like to ask you

CONTACT_US.SUCCESS: Thanks for reaching out, %FIRST_NAME%. We will get back to you as soon as possible
CONTACT_US.TEXT_1: Let’s get started with your contact information
CONTACT_US.TEXT_2: We only receive what is needed to get in touch with you
CONTACT_US.MESSAGE_INPUT: Let us know how we can help
